quoteLast: , the near encounter phase began: Voyager 1 was almost there! In the press room, someone taped a fortune cookie message to the Voyager TV monitor: “There is a prospect of a thrilling time ahead for you.”

quoteLast: showed that most of them tried to get into the band wagon. The five who voted ‘no’ were probably ‘in for life,’ and not afraid of the consequences.

quoteFirst: "News? Let's see?" reflected Chilvers. "Grandma Marshall, here, won the July cup, and our team won the match with South Meadows by a score of
quoteLast: . Say, we didn't do a thing to those boys. Moon has bought two new clubs, Boyd made the sixth hole in two, Duff won four dozen balls from Monahan, Lawson has a new stance which he claims will lengthen out his drive twenty yards--and speaking about Lawson, he discovers something every week which lengthens his drive at least twenty yards.
title: John Henry Smith: A humorous romance of outdoor life
author: Adams, Frederick Upham, 1859-1921

quoteFirst: There I found a Brigade message--this time a written one--waiting for me.  It bore the hour
quoteLast: 16/6/15, and was as follows--'As many Officers and men of your Battalion as can be collected should be taken back to Le T----,[2] where arrangements are being made for food and rest A.A.A.  As two Battalions are remaining as trench garrison, you should not crowd trenches by waiting A.A.A.
title: James Lusk: Letters & Memories
author: Lusk, James, 1878-1915
